messages.title: Building a stronger economy and fairer society in Hornsey & Wood Green
messages.content: The Lib Dems have cut taxes by £800 a year for ordinary workers - and want to make sure workers on the minimum wage pay no tax at all on their income.

messages.title: Our promise of more
messages.content: Cut Income Tax by an additional £400 for low and middle income workers. Increase NHS spending by £8 billion a year and guarantee mental health equality. Balance the budget fairly, and invest to build a high-skill, low-carbon economy.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: An £800 Income Tax cut for ordinary workers, reduced the deficit and helped to create over 2 million new jobs.
Increased the health budget each year to deliver 6,000 more doctors.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Labour's plans to close the Whittington A&E

issues.economy: Cut taxes by £800 a year for ordinary workers; ensured workers on minimum wage pay no tax at all. Pledge to cut Income Tax by an additional £400 for low and middle income workers.
issues.education: Secured over £7.6 million in additional funding for Haringey’s schools.
issues.health: Over £30 million for our health services. Increased the health budget each year. Promise to increase NHS spending by £8 billion a year and guarantee mental health equality.

endorsements.endorsement: Pauline Mulee is backing Lynne to deliver locally. After years in her industry, it feels like the right time to set up my own business. Lynne Featherstone has always supported local businesses.

quotes.text: Thanks to Lynne Featherstone and the Lib Dems, every infant school pupil is receiving free school meals.

images.caption: Lynne Featherstone engaging with people and promoting her and the Liberal Democrats' achievements and plans.
